Wisdom: احْفَظْ عُمُرَكَ مِنَ التَّضْيِيعِ لَهُ فِي غَيْرِ الْعِبَادَةِ وَالطَّاعَاتِ
enWisdom: Guard your lifetime from being wasted in other than acts of worship and obedience [to Allah]

Wisdom: احْذَرُوا ضِيَاعَ الْأَعْمَارِ فِيمَا لَا يَبْقَى لَكُمْ فَفَائِتُهَا لَا يَعُودُ
enWisdom: Be wary of wasting your lifetimes in that which will not remain for you, for that which has passed from it does not return

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَنْفَاسَكَ أَجْزَاءُ عُمُرِكَ فَلَا تُفْنِهَا إِلَّا فِي طَاعَةٍ تُزْلِفُكَ
enWisdom: Verily your breaths are portions of your life, so do not use them up except in the obedience that brings you closer [to Allah]

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمَغْبُونَ مَنْ غُبِنَ عُمُرَهُ وَإِنَّ الْمَغْبُوطَ مَنْ أَنْفَذَ عُمُرَهُ فِي طَاعَةِ رَبِّهِ
enWisdom: Indeed deceived is the one who is deluded with regards to his life and enviable is one who spends his life in the obedience of his Lord
Lifetimes are wasted between hope and aspiration

Wisdom: كَفَى بِالرَّجُلِ غَفْلَةً أَنْ يُضَيِّعَ عُمُرَهُ فِيمَا لَا يُنْجِيهِ
enWisdom: It is enough of negligence for a person to squander his life in that which will not save him [in the Hereafter]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَفْنَى عُمُرَهُ فِي غَيْرِ مَا يُنْجِيهِ فَقَدْ أَضَاعَ مَطْلَبَهُ
enWisdom: One who spends his life in other than that which will save him [in the Hereafter] has missed his objective

Wisdom: مَنْ قَصَّرَ فِي أَيَّامِ أَمَلِهِ قَبْلَ حُضُورِ أَجَلِهِ فَقَدْ خَسِرَ عُمُرَهُ وَضَرَّهُ أَجَلُهُ
enWisdom: One who is neglectful in his days of hope, before his death comes, has indeed made a loss in his life and is harmed by his death
Loss [of opportunities] are [a cause of] distress
Opportunities are things that are [meant to be] seized
